results.title: Increased finger skin vasoreactivity and stimulated vasomotion associated with simvastatin therapy in systemic sclerosis hypercholesterolemic patients.
results.text_hl: We conducted an open-label trial to evaluate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ therapy was, or was not, associated in @DISEASE_Scleroderma_Systemic @DISEASE_MESH:D012595 @@@systemic sclerosis@@@ @DISEASE_Hyperlipoproteinemia_Type_II @DISEASE_MESH:D006938 @@@hypercholesterolemic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ (SSc-Ps) with beneficial changes in finger skin microvascular function. 13 females SSc-Ps and 15 females healthy control subjects (CSs), age-matched with SSc-Ps, underwent finger skin @<m>DISEASE_Adjustment_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000275 @@@post-occlusive reactive hyperaemia@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Adjustment_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000275 @@@PORH@@@), using laser Doppler flowmetry (LDF).

citations.NLM: Rossi M, Bazzichi L, Ghiadoni L, Mencaroni I, Franzoni F, Bombardieri S. Increased finger skin vasoreactivity and stimulated vasomotion associated with simvastatin therapy in systemic sclerosis hypercholesterolemic patients. Rheumatol Int. 2012 Dec;32(12):3715-21. PMID: 22057138
citations.BibTeX: @article{22057138, title={Increased finger skin vasoreactivity and stimulated vasomotion associated with simvastatin therapy in systemic sclerosis hypercholesterolemic patients.}, author={Rossi M and Bazzichi L and Ghiadoni L and Mencaroni I and Franzoni F and Bombardieri S}, journal={Rheumatol Int}, volume={32}, number={12}, pages={3715-21}}

results.title: Attenuation of astrogliosis and modulation of endothelial growth factor receptor in lipid rafts by simvastatin after traumatic brain injury.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: These data suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduces @<m>DISEASE_Adjustment_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000275 @@@reactive@@@ @DISEASE_Gliosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005911 @@@astrogliosis@@@ and rescues neuronal cells after @DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@.

citations.NLM: Wu H, Mahmood A, Lu D, Jiang H, Xiong Y, Zhou D, Chopp M. Attenuation of astrogliosis and modulation of endothelial growth factor receptor in lipid rafts by simvastatin after traumatic brain injury. J Neurosurg. 2010 Sep;113(3):591-7. PMID: 19895202
citations.BibTeX: @article{19895202, title={Attenuation of astrogliosis and modulation of endothelial growth factor receptor in lipid rafts by simvastatin after traumatic brain injury.}, author={Wu H and Mahmood A and Lu D and Jiang H and Xiong Y and Zhou D and Chopp M}, journal={J Neurosurg}, volume={113}, number={3}, pages={591-7}}
